title: 92: All The Queen's Horses
itunes:title: All The Queen's Horses
description:
FIFTY. THREE. MILLION. DOLLARS. That's how much cash Rita Crundwell stole FROM HER CITY GOVERNMENT JOB without anyone noticing. She bought houses, and horses, and spa retreats AND A TWO MILLION DOLLAR BUS. How did she do it? HOW DID NOBODY NOTICE? This story is exactly as insane as it sounds!

ON THIS WEEK'S AFTER PARTY, P & G talk all about the NYC LIVE PRIDE SHOW! And WE PLAY THE CLIPS OF OUR FAVORITE AND FUNNIEST MOMENTS! Check it out!

LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? WHO COULD BLAME YOU! Join our Patreon fam and instantly get over 80 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW! Including our episode-by-episode coverage of "Serial," "The Jinx," "Making A Murderer," "The Staircase," "Lorena," and so many more! You can also get ad-free versions of our regular episodes! JOIN HERE!
